Together with your support, VGH & UBC Hospital Foundation is improving lives in our community. We are Vancouver Costal Health’s primary philanthropic partner.

about the foundation

Your support enables us to ensure the best care is available to every adult British Columbian. Our donors drive innovation and health care transformation.
